cities.name: Sydney, Australia
cities.description: Experience urban life and natural wonders in Sydney. Features: iconic Opera House, beautiful Bondi Beach, harbour cruises, coastal walks, wildlife encounters at Taronga Zoo, vibrant food markets, and historic The Rocks district.

cities.name: Melbourne, Australia
cities.description: Discover Melbourne's artistic soul. Highlights: street art in laneways, Federation Square galleries, coffee culture, tram rides, Queen Victoria Market, Royal Botanic Gardens, and sports at MCG.

cities.name: Tokyo, Japan
cities.description: Immerse in Tokyo's unique blend of tradition and future. Attractions: ancient temples, modern Shibuya crossing, anime culture in Akihabara, sushi at Tsukiji, cherry blossoms in Ueno Park, and shopping in Harajuku.

cities.name: Kyoto, Japan
cities.description: Step back in time in historic Kyoto. Features: traditional tea ceremonies, zen gardens, historic temples like Kinkaku-ji, geisha district of Gion, bamboo forest in Arashiyama, and seasonal festivals.

cities.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
cities.description: Experience Rio's vibrant spirit. Highlights: carnival celebrations, Christ the Redeemer, Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, samba dancing, Sugarloaf Mountain cable car, and Tijuca National Park.

cities.name: São Paulo, Brazil
cities.description: Explore São Paulo's urban energy. Features: diverse cuisine, MASP art museum, Ibirapuera Park, Vila Madalena street art, Pinacoteca gallery, and vibrant nightlife in Beco do Batman.

temples.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
temples.description: Explore the world's largest religious monument. Features: ancient Khmer architecture, sunrise views, intricate stone carvings, Buddhist temples, Ta Prohm's tree-covered ruins, and Bayon's face towers.

temples.name: Taj Mahal, India
temples.description: Marvel at this monument to eternal love. Highlights: Mughal architecture, marble domes, Persian gardens, intricate inlay work, Yamuna River views, and stunning sunrise and sunset vistas.

beaches.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
beaches.description: Paradise found in the South Pacific. Features: overwater bungalows, crystal lagoons, coral reefs, Mount Otemanu views, water sports, and luxury spa retreats.

beaches.name: Copacabana Beach, Brazil
beaches.description: Experience Rio's most famous beach. Highlights: golden sands, beach volleyball, sunset views, seaside restaurants, Sugarloaf Mountain backdrop, and vibrant beach culture.
